mapper.select: select m.materialName,mf.consumeOfYear,mf.unit from ap_material_fill mf left join ap_material m on m.id=mf.materialId left join ap_product_fill pf on pf.id=mf.productFillId where pf.id=#{productfillId}
select pf.id productfId,m.materialName,mf.consumeOfYear,mf.unit from ap_material_fill mf left join ap_material m on m.id=mf.materialId left join ap_product_fill pf on pf.id=mf.productFillId

select (select name from ap_static where id=d.deviceTypeId)as fdeviceName,(select name from ap_static where id=d.deviceTypeId2)as fdeviceName2,d.deviceSerial fdeviceSerial from ap_devices d left join ap_facility_device fd on fd.deviceId=d.id left join ap_control_facilities cf on cf.id=fd.facilityId where cf.id=#{facilityId}

select cf.id facilityId,(select name from ap_static where id=d.deviceTypeId)as fdeviceName,(select name from ap_static where id=d.deviceTypeId2)as fdeviceName2,d.deviceSerial fdeviceSerial from ap_devices d left join ap_facility_device fd on fd.deviceId=d.id left join ap_control_facilities cf on cf.id=fd.facilityId

select d.stepSerial fstepSerial,d.stepName fstepName from ap_producestep d left join ap_facility_step fd on fd.stepId=d.id left join ap_control_facilities cf on cf.id=fd.facilityId where cf.id=#{facilityId}
select cf.id facilityId,d.stepSerial fstepSerial,d.stepName fstepName from ap_producestep d left join ap_facility_step fd on fd.stepId=d.id left join ap_control_facilities cf on cf.id=fd.facilityId
